TEXT.TITLE: INTERNATIONAL THOMSON TO REPORT IN U.S. FUNDS
TEXT.BODY:
<International Thomson Organisation Ltd> said it will report financial results in U.S. funds rather than sterling, beginning from Jan 1, 1987. It said the change will not be applied retroactively to prior financial periods. The company said as a result of recent investments, most of its assets now are located in the United States.
Reuter
